title: ISic003540. I.Sicily inscription 003540
body:
Facsimile Images

D(is) · M(anibus) ·
M(arco) · Sellio
Attico ·
vix(it) · a(nnis) · XXV

Apparatus criticus

Text of Bitto 2001

English translation

To the Spirits of the Dead. For Marcus Sellius Atticus. He lived for 25 years.

commentary
